- Iterative, heat-kernel similarities; parallelized updates available.

# SNIC {#snic}
- Non-iterative; sequential priority queue; connected components by design.

# SLIC {#slic}
- Iterative with local windows; preserves K; good speed/quality balance.

# Slice-MSF {#slice-msf}
- Slice-wise minimum spanning forest; supports consensus and stitching.

# FLASH-3D {#flash3d}
- DCT-based hashing/compression; fast approximation; temporal smoothing via `lambda_t`.
